basics.name: Abhishek Mukherjee
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: A software developer experienced in building scalable applications, including e-commerce, financial platforms, and online services. Skilled in frontend, backend, SEO, and business growth strategies. Currently learning Gen AI and DevOps.

work.name: Freelance Developer
work.summary: As a freelancer, I've successfully completed various projects in SEO and web development, helping clients boost their online presence and achieve growth. I have experience working with both B2B and B2C clients, optimizing websites for search engines, creating high-quality backlinks, and improving overall website performance.
highlights: Improved SEO rankings and visibility for multiple clients across different industries
Created and optimized websites for better user experience and performance
Worked with clients to develop tailored SEO strategies that align with their business goals
responsibilities: Developing and optimizing websites for better performance
Implementing SEO strategies and best practices
Analyzing website metrics and providing improvement recommendations
achievements: Successfully improved search rankings for multiple clients
Helped clients achieve their business goals through digital optimization

work.name: Vedant Asset Limited
work.summary: A software developer with extensive experience in building scalable, high-performance applications. I have developed and contributed to various projects, including full-fledged e-commerce platforms, financial applications, and online services. My expertise spans frontend and backend development, SEO, and business growth strategies.
highlights: Developed a full-fledged agritech e-commerce platform from scratch, ensuring scalability and robust performance.
Built multiple landing pages and SEO-optimized websites, increasing organic traffic and conversion rates.
Contributed to financial and insurance platforms, focusing on backend and front-end integration.
Provided strategic SEO and business expansion plans for international clients.
